requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/2003/Vista/7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4350/ AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480/ AMD Radeon HD 5970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300/ AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 590/ AMD Radeon HD 6990
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
